const.name: TKRCloseoutTrans
const.notes: Transverse dimension of the business part of the tray, large enough to include all silicon, closeout, etc. but no larger (Revised 3May02)

const.name: TKRTrayWidth
const.notes: Large enough to include 2 MCM boards (and 2 gaps) as well as closeout.

const.name: waferPitch
const.notes: Distance between centers of adjacent wafers in a ladder

const.name: ladderPitch
const.notes: Distance between centers of adjacent wafers in adjacent ladders

const.name: TKRGuardRing
const.notes: Width of dead region around outside of Si wafer

const.name: TKRBiasWidth
const.notes: Transverse dimension of bias board (for now assuming it's a square

const.name: TKRCloseoutThick
const.notes: Z dimension of closeout for trays other than top and bottom

const.name: TKRCloseoutThickOuter
const.notes: Z dimension of closeout for top and bottom trays

const.name: TKRCloseoutLen
const.notes: Transverse length of longer of (imaginary) closeout pieces, just the same as the face sheet

const.name: TKRCloseoutLenShort
const.notes: Transverse length of shorter of (imaginary) closeout pieces

const.name: TKRCoreWidth
const.notes: Length of sides for core

const.name: TKRCloseout_dt
const.notes: Transverse (x or y) offset of closeout pieces w.r.t. tray

const.name: MCMLength
const.notes: Long transverse dimension of MCM board

const.name: TKRWallLengthShort
const.notes: For the XML description, tracker wall is broken up into 4 pieces: 2 long ones extending in X and two slightly shorter ones extending in Y. This is the length of the shorter ones.

const.name: TKRWall_dt
const.notes: Positive transverse offset of TKR wall, relative to center of a tower

const.name: TKRWall_dtn
const.notes: Negative transverse offset of TKR wall, relative to center of a tower

const.name: TKRCloseout_dtn
const.notes: Negative transverse offset of closeout pieces

const.name: TKRMCMint_dz
const.notes: Offset of MCM board on + side w.r.t. enclosing envelope for interior (not top or bottom) boards

const.name: TKRMCMint_dzn
const.notes: Offset of MCM board on - side w.r.t. enclosing envelope for interior (not top or bottom) boards

const.name: TKRMCMext_dz
const.notes: Offset of MCM board on + side w.r.t. enclosing envelope for exterior (top or bottom) boards

const.name: TKRMCMext_dzn
const.notes: Offset of MCM board on - side w.r.t. enclosing envelope for exterior (top or bottom) boards

const.name: TKRMCM_dt
const.notes: Transverse (x or y) offset of MCM board

const.name: TKRMCM_dtn
const.notes: Negative transverse (x or y) offset of MCM board

const.name: biasGlueThick
const.notes: Thickness of upper bias board and glue above it

const.notes: Thickness of combined glue+ face-sheet + glue + bias-board + glue for non-superGLAST trays

const.name: TKRTopFaceSupZ
const.notes: Thickness of combined glue+ face-sheet + glue + bias-board + glue for superGLAST trays

const.name: TKRBotFaceRegZ
const.notes: Thickness of bottom face sheet and surrounding glue for non-superGLAST trays

const.name: TKRBotFaceSupZ
const.notes: Thickness of bottom face sheet and surrounding glue for superGLAST trays

const.name: TKRFaceMinZ
const.notes: Thickness of regular face sheet and glue attaching it to core/closeout

const.notes: Tray number of most forward "regular" tray. Top tray doesn't qualify since it has no top Si.
